_header: The craft of all crafts it is the craft of love
_description: A couplet in a Latin sermon on confession

OxfBal219.Transcription:
þe craft of all craftys it is þe craft of loweþat
                    craft he can a lone þat lykys all a boue
OxfBal219.Editions:
Mynors,  Roger Aubrey Baskerville,
                        ed.  
             Catalogue of Manuscripts in Balliol College Library.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1962: 214.
